languages.text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this shotgun must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become poisoned, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (8) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Targets hit with this shotgun must pass a Toughness test or become poisoned, suffering 8 damage each turn.

Targets {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} with this shotgun must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or become poisoned, suffering toxin (8) damage each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 使用此霰弹枪{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会承受{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（8）效果，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}受到毒素{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this shotgun must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become poisoned, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (8) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用此霰弹枪{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会承受{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}（8）效果，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}受到毒素伤害。

languages.text: このショットガンが{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}したターゲットは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に合格しなければ毒状態となり、各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g} (8){g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}したターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格しなければ毒状態となり、各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g} (8) ダメージが付与される。

languages.text: Los objetivos que reciban un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de esta escopeta deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o quedarán envenenados, recibiendo {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (8) por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los objetivos que reciban un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} de esta escopeta deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} o quedarán envenenados, recibiendo daño de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} (8) por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Ziele, die mit dieser Schrotflinte {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} werden, müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, da sie ansonsten vergiftet werden und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Giftschaden{/g} (8) pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} erleiden.{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}{/g}

languages.text: Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} à l'aide de ce fusil à pompe doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, faute de quoi elles sont empoisonnées et subissent les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (8) à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchées{/g} à l'aide de ce fusil à pompe doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, faute de quoi elles sont empoisonnées et subissent les dégâts de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} (8) à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
